name: O.O.O.O.O. ~Orin's Orbicular Opposition Over Okuu
description:
Ver 0.22 is the version submitted for JAM

Orin is rolling down a seemingly endless snowy mountain stuck on top of a high speed snowball, dodge the obstacles and beware of the certain mischievous raven!

Controls:

UP ARROW: Jump

DOWN ARROW: Descend quickly after jumping

ENTER: Confirm menu

Members: 

Seeker/Programmer
ThunderBird007/Programmer
Pachy/Artist(https://poochipachy.itch.io/)
HeatDragon26/Game Designer
Manuel Zito/Composer(https://manuelzitocomposer.itch.io/)
Panchamon/Artist(https://panchamon.itch.io/)

This game will be updated later because there was not enough time to complete it.
